results.text_hl: Taken the results of all the above-mentioned studies together, it was hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may have positive effects on the pathology of @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@MS@@@.

results.title: Pathogenic Role of Fibrinogen in the Neuropathology of Multiple Sclerosis: A Tale of Sorrows and Fears
results.text_hl: Therefore, targeting of @GENE_FGB @GENE_2244 @@@fibrinogen@@@ and/or @GENE_ITGAM @GENE_3684 @@@CD11b@@@/CD18 receptors by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and statins might decrease @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@MS neuropathology@@@.

results.title: Metformin: A Review of Potential Mechanism and Therapeutic Utility Beyond Diabetes
results.text_hl: Preclinical studies have also shown some evidence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s neuroprotective role in @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson's disease@@@, @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@multiple sclerosis@@@ and @DISEASE_Huntington_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@Huntington's disease@@@.

results.title: Overview of Metformin and Neurodegeneration: A Comprehensive Review.
results.text_hl: Originally used as a first-line treatment for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@, recent studies have begun investigating @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s effects beyond @DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic disorders@@@, particularly its neuroprotective capabilities against conditions like @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@Parkinson's disease@@@, @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@, @DISEASE_Huntington_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@Huntington's disease@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@multiple sclerosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Kruczkowska W, Gałęziewska J, Buczek P, Płuciennik E, Kciuk M, Śliwińska A. Overview of Metformin and Neurodegeneration: A Comprehensive Review. Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2025 Mar 28;18(4):. PMID: 40283923

results.title: The AMPK activator metformin improves recovery from demyelination by shifting oligodendrocyte bioenergetics and accelerating OPC differentiation
results.text_hl: This finding broadens our knowledge of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s potential to promote myelin repair in @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@MS@@@ and in other diseases with @DISEASE_Demyelinating_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D003711 @@@myelin loss@@@ or altered myelination dynamics.

results.title: Systematic approach to selecting licensed drugs for repurposing in the treatment of progressive multiple sclerosis.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: From a short list of 55 treatments, we recommended four treatments for immediate testing in progressive @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@MS@@@: R-alpha-lipoic acid, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, the combination treatment of R-alpha-lipoic acid and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Niacin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009525 @@@niacin@@@.

results.title: Cytokine Storm and Failed Resolution in COVID-19: Taking a Cue from Multiple Sclerosis.
results.text_hl: Accordingly, taking a cue from our experiences in controlling robust @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ response in @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@MS@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ by simultaneously inhibiting @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ process and stimulating its resolution, combinatorial therapy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and SPM in @DISEASE_COVID_19 @DISEASE_MESH:D000086382 @@@COVID-19@@@ holds significant promise in treating this global health crisis.

citations.NLM: Zahoor I, Li Y, Rattan R, Giri S. Cytokine Storm and Failed Resolution in COVID-19: Taking a Cue from Multiple Sclerosis. Adv Exp Med Biol. 2021;1352():211-222. PMID: 35132603
